title: Medibank hackers claim to have leaked  the last set of stolen files
description: REvil hackers have leaked the final set of stolen files from Australian insurance giant Medibank.

title: Android December update lets you share your digital car keys with iPhones
description: Google will soon roll out multiple quality of life changes including a Reading Mode for the visually impaired.

title: Whatever your display needs, ASUS has you covered with a new OLED monitor
description: ASUS offers a range of OLED monitors to suit every need, whether for faster gaming performance, accurate and reliable color, or portability.

title: Nvidia patches a whole host of GPU driver security bugs
description: Update to Nvidia GPU driver may prevent denial of service attacks, information disclosure, or data tampering.

title: The Meta Quest Pro just got the audio update that I wish the Oculus Quest 2 had
description: The Meta Quest Pro's latest update brings background audio (a feature I wish the Quets 2 had) as well as better video capture.

title: 1Password reveals passwordless authentication add-on for all your favourite browsers
description: New tool which integrates 1Password with 3rd party single sign-on providers.

title: Apex Legends' Wintertide event is back with some very snazzy skins
description: Apex Legends is bringing Wintertide back with a bang, with 24 all-new cosmetics to collect and the return of the Winter Express game mode.

title: Battlefield 2042 developer to "lean into previous games" to revitalize it
description: Battlefield 2042 is set to receive some sizeable changes in its fourth season as the developers return to form.

title: Huawei's latest smartwatch comes with a secret pair of earbuds
description: Huawei has unveiled the Watch Buds; it's a smartwatch that doubles as a case for a pair of wireless earbuds

title: Twitter alternative Hive shuts down to fix major security issues
description: Platform's security issues are placed under the spotlight as its popularity surges following Musk's Twitter deal.

title: These are the file types most likely to be hiding malware
description: The dreaded Office file has finally been dethroned, and it probably has something to do with macros.

title: Safeguarding against next-gen cyber risks
description: Alex Holland discusses with TechRadar Pro how the cyber security landscape is shifting, what this means for cyber criminals, and the approach businesses must take to defend against future attacks. Hardware-level security should be a foundational element of any strategy, especially with office workers increasingly distributed. Partnerships between the likes of HP and Intel® are at the heart of this, with increased collaboration raising the barrier of entry, and cutting the reward for hackers.

title: Lots of firms still don't really seem to be fully backing hybrid working
description: Paying attention to the figures and not speculation is key to the success of hybrid working across the world.

title: Nvidia GTX 1060 is no longer the most popular GPU on Steam... but its successor might surprise you
description: The new top-ranked graphics card on Steam is… drum roll… a slightly slower GPU than the GTX 1060, believe it or not.

title: The PCs protecting workers on the move
description: How new innovations allow businesses to retain the freedom of hybrid working without sacrificing cyber security

title: Over 300,000 Android users hit by Facebook login-stealing malware
description: 'Schoolyard Bully' is targeting people all over the world, but mostly people living in Vietnam.

title: The cloud networking market is broken – Netmaker is trying to fix it
description: Netmaker wants to bring better performance, security and flexibility to the core of the cloud computing game.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max, and more this weekend (December 2)
description: From long-awaited movie sequels to returning crime series, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: This major Android bug may have led to the creation of awful new malware apps
description: Android signing keys from some of the world's biggest OEMs were leaked, researchers say.

title: Crusader Kings 3 patch lets you neglect your children more efficiently
description: Paradox Interactive’s free 1.8.0 update for Crusader Kings 3 is full of tweaks and fixes. As usual, these vary from the hilarious to the downright weird.

title: Amnesia: The Bunker sounds like a horror game with too much tension, not enough story
description: The new Amnesia game will go rogue by letting you choose your destiny in a dread-filled sandbox of horror.

title: New Windows update may ruin your Task Manager
description: Among the list of known issues in 22H2 is a bug affecting Task Manager’s colors, rendering it unreadable.

title: Apple is set to release its Meta Quest Pro rival in 2023, but it could be too late
description: The ‘extended reality’ operating system will allegedly be used to power three new mixed-reality headsets from Apple.

title: BOE reveals 600Hz laptop display, and we’re sick of this refresh rate nonsense
description: BOE trumps its 500Hz screen unveiled in early 2022, but does anyone really need these kind of panels?

title: The Mandalorian season 3 release date has been delayed – but not by much
description: Disney and Lucasfilm have finally shared an official release date for The Mandalorian season 3.

title: The Rings of Power season 2 drops a big name star as key character is recast
description: The Rings of Power has added six actors to its season 2 cast – and surprisingly recast one of its villains.

title: Get over 80 games and help charity with the Yogcast's Jingle Jam Christmas bundle
description: Jingle Jam raises funds for Huntington's Disease research, giving you 85 games as a thank you for your donation.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 could fix one of the Z Flip 4’s biggest issues
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 might have a much bigger cover screen than the Z Flip 4, along with a new hinge design.

title: Indiana Jones 5 trailer goes back to the series' roots – and I couldn't be happier
description: The first trailer for Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny has been released – and it's the 80s nostalgia we all need.

title: Next-gen QD-OLED TVs could go 8K sooner than you think
description: Samsung Display reportedly owns the equipment to take the tech beyond 4K, and make sharper gaming monitors.

title: Atomi's newest e-scooter doubles up on safety but stays neutral on other features
description: While the motor isn't all that impressive, you can still light up the night in style thanks to numerous lights present.
